Description:
Indicates that there are anomalous patterns of behavior like suspicious changes to the directory.

Author: Mark Morowczynski '@markmorow', Gloria Lee, '@gleeiamglo'
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Anomalous User Activity
Query: sourcetype='azure-riskdetection' eql select * from _source_ where riskeventtype = 'anomaloususeractivity'
